title: Oscars Celebration!
description:
Its Oscars week on Comedy Gold Minds and we’re celebrating with some of our favorite interview moments from some of this year’s nominees.  We’re featuring some of the best discussions from past shows, including Kevin’s interviews with Eddie Murphy,  Awkwafina, Adam McKay and Danny McBride.

Like Comedy Gold Minds? SiriusXM subscribers get it a day early, plus Kevin Hart’s Laugh Out Loud Radio, his 24/7 comedy channel, with great talk shows and stand-up. Learn more / check it out for 3 months at siriusxm.com/comedygoldminds.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Kevin Hart, Danny McBride, Awkwafina, Eddie Murphy, Arsenio Hall)
